clinical_study.brief_title: Imatinib Mesylate And Cyclophosphamide In Metronomic Administration: Dose Escalation Study Of Imatinib Mesylate
clinical_study.official_title: Imatinib Mesylate And Cyclophosphamide In Metronomic Administration: Dose Escalation Study Of Imatinib Mesylate in Patient With Rare Tumor (Phase I Study)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the maximum tolerated dose of imatinib mesylate, given in association with a fixed dose of cyclophosphamide (50 mg bid).

secondary_outcome.measure: For anti tumoral efficiency : RECIST criteria

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Rare tumor
- metastatic disease or locally advanced disease, inoperable, with no standard treatment
- At least 28 days since the prior treatment
- Measurable disease with at least one measurable lesion
Exclusion Criteria:
- Medullary insufficiency
- Cystitis, haemorrhagic cystitis
- Hepatic porphyria
